tweet.text: Following positions at @TheWilsonCenter and @Georgetown, Albright headed the 1992 transition for President-elect Bill Clinton’s National Security Council. In January 1993, Pres. Clinton appointed Albright as U.S. Ambassador to the United Nations, @USUN. 📷 @WJCLibrary https://t.co/GADW7xasJ2
